channel.title: Rare Beauty by Selena Gomez – MY COSMETIC

image.title: Rare Beauty by Selena Gomez – MY COSMETIC

item.title: Perfect Strokes Universal Volumizing Mascara
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Castor Oil: Conditions, softens, and nourishes lashes.
Water/Aqua/Eau, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cera Carnauba/Cire de carnauba, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Synthetic Wax, Stearic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Palmitic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Polyacrylate-21, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Synthetic Beeswax, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Galactoarabinan, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Shorea Robusta Resin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Xanthan Gum, Trideceth-6 Phosphate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Dipropylene Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Ultramarines (CI 77007).
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A universal mascara with a unique eye-hugging brush to lift, lengthen, curl, and volumize every lash type for a lusher look.

Formulation Type: Volumizing, Curling, and Lengthening

Benefits: Long-wearing

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Castor Oil: Conditions, softens, and nourishes lashes.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. It is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Finding the perfect mascara comes down to your lash type, which differs from person to person. This weightless, easy-to-build formula and curvy, multi-length brush are made to give every lash type (fine/sparse, full/thick, straight, and curly) more lift, length, curl, and volume.

Clinical Results: In an independent instrumental study of 120 subjects:
– 100% of all lash types had more length and volume
– 95% of all lash types had more lift
– 92% of all lash types had more curl

item.title: Kind Words Lip Liner
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isohexadecane, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Isododecane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire microcristalline, Polybutene, Silica, C13-15 Alkane, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire de carnauba, Paraffin, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Fragrance/Parfum, Caprylyl Glycol, Diisostearyl Malate, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Linalool. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A super creamy, waterproof lip liner that glides on like a balm to define lips—in the same 10 rich, made-to-match shades as the Kind Words Matte Lipstick.

Formulation Type: Lip Liner

Benefits: Hydrating and Long-wearing

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. It is also vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Define and shape lips with one-swipe color and a soft matte finish. With an incredibly smooth, balm-like glide that won’t skip or tug, this waterproof liner not only stays put all day without smudging, but it keeps your lipstick in place, too. Keep the retractable tip sharp with the built-in sharpener.

Clinical Results: In an independent consumer study of 51 people:
– 100% said it draws smooth, even lines
– 100% said lips don’t feel dry and that it’s comfortable to wear
– 100% said it helps prevent lipstick from feathering or bleeding

item.title: Lip Soufflé Matte Cream Lipstick
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Dimethicone, Methyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Isododecane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylene Carbonate, Fragrance/Parfum, Linalool, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera (Sacred Lotus) Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 27 (CI 45410), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090)].
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A weightless air-whipped lip cream that hugs lips with rich color and nourishing hydration that gives a soft velvety matte finish.

Formulation type: Liquid lipstick

Benefits: Hydrating

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This hydrating, whipped matte formula glides on for full-on color and a featherweight feel that stays comfortable all day with no drying or caking. Made with a botanical blend of lotus, gardenia, and white waterlily, plus Vitamin E, it nourishes while smoothing out lips with a soft blurring effect.

item.title: With Gratitude Dewy Lip Balm
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Diisostearyl Malate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Ceresin, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Fragrance/Parfum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera (Sacred Lotus) Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Linalool. [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090)].
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A hydrating, nourishing balm with a buildable, light-to-medium dose of color and a natural dewy finish.

Formulation: Lip Balm & Treatment

Benefits: Hydrating

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: With a buildable dose of dewy color, this tinted lip balm wraps lips in weightless hydration that lasts all day, so they feel nourished and nurtured. With shea butter and a botanical blend of lotus, gardenia, and white waterlily, it cushions lips while building color so they look fuller and healthier.

item.title: Stay Vulnerable Liquid Eyeshadow
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Isododecane, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Mica, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Tin Oxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A weightless, liquid-to-powder eyeshadow that blends seamlessly for a quick, buildable wash of long-lasting, waterproof, crease-resistant color.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This quick and easy formula goes from liquid to powder in seconds. Velvety-smooth, creamy, and never sticky, it blends and builds easily before setting to a soft, satin finish that lasts all day—no creasing, smudging, fading, transferring, or drying out your skin.

item.title: Brow Harmony Shape & Fill Duo
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Isononyl Isononanoate, Mica, Nylon-12, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Boron Nitride, Lauroyl Lysine, Diisostearyl Malate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Calcium Silicate, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Hexylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)].
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A waterproof brow putty that softly shapes and fills in brows for a natural, mistake-proof look that lasts.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. It is also cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This breakthrough putty glides on creamy and sets to a buildable powder finish, minus the powder fallout, for an instantly fuller, more defined look that won’t smudge. The complementary shades mimic brows’ gradient tones for the most natural-looking depth and dimension.

Clinical Results: In an independent consumer study of 72 subjects:
– 100% said it instantly fills in sparse brows for a natural look
– 100% said it adheres to brows and doesn’t cake or flake
– 98% said it’s smudgeproof and doesn’t transfer or rub off

item.title: Perfect Strokes Matte Liquid Liner
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Water/Aqua/Eau, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Laureth-21, Pentylene Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, PPG-2-Deceth-30, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Black 2 (CI 77266)[NANO].
item.content:encoded:
What it is: An easy-glide, waterproof liquid eyeliner with up to 800 vegan bristles to lay down long-lasting, ultra-black lines with perfect precision every time

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: The same rich, long-lasting formula—now with a new and improved brush! Revamped for smooth ink flow every time without leaking or drying out, the fine, flexible brush tip draws perfect strokes that won’t smudge, streak, or flake for a just-applied look all day. Shake well with cap on before use.

item.title: Positive Light Liquid Luminizer Highlight
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Isododecane, Mica, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera (Sacred Lotus) Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isostearic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tin Oxide, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499)].
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A silky, second-skin liquid highlighter that creates a lasting, soft, and luminous finish.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Packed with light-reflecting pearl particles and a botanical blend of lotus, gardenia, and white waterlily, this multidimensional formula lends skin a dewy glow in seconds. Mix this weightless liquid highlighter with foundation or layer it across the high points of the face for instant radiance.

item.title: Always an Optimist Soft Radiance Setting Powder
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Mica, Calcium Carbonate, Silica, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Magnesium Myristate, Nylon-12, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Magnesium Stearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Squalane, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)].
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A silky, do-it-all, talc-free loose setting powder to visibly smooth, blur, and control shine for a soft natural finish and all-day comfort.

Coverage: Light

Finish: Natural

Formulation: Loose Powder

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Super-finely milled and silky to the touch, this powder goes on light and airy to provide sheer, seamless coverage with a subtle but visible radiance and a natural finish. Extend makeup wear, blur the look of pores, and smooth skin’s texture. The custom-designed sifter locks for mess-free storage on the go.

Clinical Results:
REAL RESULTS
100% said it doesn’t look cakey or chalky
100% said it layers well and doesn’t disturb makeup
98% said it blurs and smooths the look of pores
*In an independent consumer perception study of 50 subjects

item.title: Pore Diffusing Primer – Always an Optimist Collection
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and conditions. -Green Tea Extract: Helps soothe and calm skin. -Vitamin E: Protects skin from environmental stressors.
Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Methyl Trimethicone, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Silica, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Fragrance/Parfum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Citrate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Tocopherol.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A hydrating, cushiony gel primer that blurs the look of pores and fine lines, boosts and extends makeup wear, and helps fight shine all day.

Skin Type: Normal, Oily, Dry, Combination

Concerns: Oil and Pores

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and conditions.
– Green Tea Extract: Helps soothe and calm skin.
– Vitamin E: Protects skin from environmental stressors.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, and retinyl palmitate. It is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Great alone or under makeup, this lightweight, plush gel primer helps absorb shine, visibly evens out skin texture, and smooths away the look of pores quickly with a soft-focus effect. It is made with hyaluronic acid and also soothes while providing lasting hydration, so skin stays comfortable all day under makeup.

Clinical Results: In an independent consumer study of 65 women:
– 100% said it minimizes and smooths away the look of pores
– 100% said it helps fight shine and extends foundation wear all day
– 98% said it blurs the look of fine lines
